entry.title: [US][Public cloud] - End of life for Kubernetes 1.19
entry.content:
Dec 12, 11:33 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Dec 12, 08:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Oct 6, 00:49 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 12/12/2022 08:00 UTC
End time : 12/12/2022 16:00 UTC
Service impact : No impact except for the apps that do not support the new version (1.20).
Service improvement: The aim of this maintenance is to upgrade deprecated clusters to a supported newer version (1.20).

entry.title: [GRA5][Public Cloud] MKS nodes not reachable
entry.content:
Dec 9, 21:23 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 09/12/2022 19:00 UTC
End Time : 09/12/2022 21:18 UTC
Root cause : Malfunction of GRA5 openstack's control plane.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Dec 9, 19:21 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 09/12/2022 19:00 UTC
Service impact : Managed nodes attached to a Managed Kubernetes Service are shown as NotReady.
Root cause : Diagnostic in progress, it seems to be related to a network outage.
Ongoing actions : Public Cloud team informed.

entry.title: [GRA5][Workflow Management] - Mistral
entry.content:
Dec 8, 16:29 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Dec 8, 13:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Dec 1, 12:50 UTC
Update - Update : Referring to the last information, the affected component with this maintenance is Workflow Management. The timeline don't change.

Nov 24, 23:50 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 08/12/2022 13:00 UTC
End time : 08/12/2022 16:00 UTC
Service impact : All mistral endpoints of GRA5 will be unreachable for a duration of less than 5 minutes
Service improvement : We need to migrate the Mistral services (workflow as a service for OpenStack) for one region from the current production platform to the new production platform based on Kubernetes
